name: gantt-from-tasks
prompt: Create a Gantt chart for our Q1 project with these tasks: Design (Jan 1-15), Development (Jan 10 - Feb 28), Testing (Feb 15 - Mar 10), Launch (Mar 15)
expected_behaviors: Generates a Gantt chart HTML file
Bar positions are proportional to the date ranges provided
Tasks are grouped into a named phase or workstream
Status colors applied (planned/in-progress based on dates relative to today)

name: milestone-timeline
prompt: Show our product milestones for this year on a timeline: Beta launch Mar 1, GA April 15, v2.0 Sep 1, EOY release Dec 1
expected_behaviors: Uses a horizontal milestone timeline (not a Gantt bar chart)
Each milestone has a point marker and date label
Labels alternate above/below the axis to avoid overlap

name: quarter-roadmap
prompt: Create a Q1-Q4 product roadmap for our mobile app
expected_behaviors: Uses a quarter-based grid layout (Q1, Q2, Q3, Q4 columns)
Workstreams as rows (e.g., iOS, Android, Backend, Design)
Feature cards in cells with status colors

name: today-marker-correct
prompt: Make a project timeline for our 6-month migration project starting this month
expected_behaviors: Today marker positioned correctly relative to the date range
All tasks have names assigned to a phase
Completion percentage shown if tasks are partially done
